ygData.subject: RE: 55 Songs
ygData.msgSnippet: Rokenn s song Analysis site has a link out to some detailed testing of the various clarity stacking spells and songs. I m not sure if a lute test is in there.
ygData.messageBody:
Rokenn's song Analysis site has a link out to some detailed testing of the
various clarity stacking spells and songs. I'm not sure if a lute test is in
there. I don't have the link handy here (at work). I have found that I don't
usually need to stack 2 clarity songs myself. C2 plus the 55 song seems to
do the job effectively and that frees up a song slot for me. The lute
definitely boosts health regen which in the long run saves mana.

Brilinnia Ban'Sidhe
Venator Sapentia, Xegony
